preqs: Enrolment in EDF5153 will usually occur when, due to extenuating circumstances, students require more time to complete their thesis. A case needs to be made and, with the support of their supervisors, students may enrol in EDF5153.
description: This is a unit of research study, focusing on a particular theory or issue in the field of education, undertaken with guidance and support from the supervisor. Students are expected to demonstrate initiative and independence during their research study. All honours students are required to present their research proposal at a research seminar. The honours thesis is designed for students who are intending to undertake further higher degree studies. Graduates who have successfully completed the honours thesis (both part 1 and part 2) are able to use this 16,000-word study as evidence of independent research experience in an application for entry into the doctorate program.
